PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX uowimpact: <http://uowvivo.uow.edu.au/ontology/uowimpact#>
SELECT ?subject ?impactEngagement ?type ?objectType ?title ?description ?detailOfImpact ?hideThis WHERE { ?subject ?property ?impactEngagement . ?impactEngagement a ?objectType . OPTIONAL { ?impactEngagement uowimpact:hideFromPublic ?hideThis} OPTIONAL { ?impactEngagement uowimpact:title ?title} OPTIONAL { ?impactEngagement uowimpact:description ?description} OPTIONAL { ?impactEngagement uowimpact:detailOfImpact ?detailOfImpact} }
